posts.post_title: F/S T222 Fatima Archer/Cubs SGC 30  SOLD THANK YOU
posts.post_content:
For Sale T222 Fatima Cigarettes Photo Card, Jimmy Archer, Chicago Cubs, Sweet Catcher's Pose! Sgc 30/2   SOLD THANK YOU!

Card has a vibrant/clear image and nice corners.  The back is clean with no paper loss.  There are a few wrinkles in the photo paper and about a 1/2 cm tear in the middle of the left border, hence the 30 grade.

Please email me at [url]stkindler@frontier.com[/url] or Private message me if you want it.  Payment by Money order or check only please.

Thanks, Tim Kindler
